definition: to bow and bend the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor

sentences.english: He's a brave man. I'm sure he will not kowtow to the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个勇敢的人，我相信他不会向敌人卑躬屈膝的。

sentences.english: President Obama is hands-down the biggest religion news story of the year.
sentences.chinese: 总统奥巴马的“卑躬屈膝”成为今年最大的宗教新闻。

sentences.english: If you grovel no one respects you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你自己卑躬屈膝，没有人会尊重你。

sentences.english: I'll temper a story, yes. But I won't play down, and I won't patronize.
sentences.chinese: 我编构故事，是的，但我没有贬低别人或卑躬屈膝。

sentences.english: China may enjoy the kowtow, but it doesn’t respect it.
sentences.chinese: 中国也许会喜欢卑躬屈膝的人，但是绝对不会尊重他。

sentences.english: In this letter Paul states, Let a woman learn in silence with all submissiveness .
sentences.chinese: 在这封信保罗国让一个女子学会沉默与所有卑躬屈膝。
他们在女王面前卑躬屈膝。

sentences.english: Would you like to have it? Please don't grovel. How do you usually introduce yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你想拥有它？请不要卑躬屈膝。你通常怎样介绍自己？

sentences.english: The courtiers cringed before the Queen.
sentences.chinese: 朝臣们在女王面前卑躬屈膝。

sentences.english: He is a worker who is obsequious to the boss.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个对老板卑躬屈膝的人。

sentences.english: However, be careful to not appear servile.
sentences.chinese: 不过，要注意的是不要表现得卑躬屈膝。

definition: servile and bending the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor
bowed head and ears glued (idiom); docile and obedient/at sb's beck and call
to bow down to everything sb says or does/to act submissively in order to ingratiate oneself
to ingratiate oneself with/to pander to
lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture/arrogant and bossy
to curry favor (idiom); playing up to those in power/social climbing
to get the desired outcome/to win favor by fawning on sb/to curry favor with/a fruitful outcome to reward one's labor
to rely on others for the air one breathes (idiom); to depend on sb's whim for one's living
to fawn on/to ingratiate oneself/(literary) to meet face to face
